public static boolean isHuiwen(LinkedList linkedList) {
Node first = linkedList.getFirst();
int size = linkedList.getSize();
Node head = null;
Node foot = null;
for (int a = 0; a < size / 2; a++) {
head = head == null ? first : head.next;
foot = head;
for (int i = a; i < size - 1 - a; i++) {
foot = foot.next;
}
if (!head.getData().equals(foot.getData())) {
return false;
}
}
return true;
}

golangä½¿ç”¨å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆå®ç°çš„å›æ–‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ¤æ–­
type node struct {
data interface{}
next *node
}

type linkList struct {
head *node
tail *node
size int32
}

func (l *linkList) reverseList() {
l.tail = l.head
var after *node
var pre *node
root := l.head
if l.head != nil && l.head.next != nil {
for root.next != nil {
after = root.next
root.next = pre
pre = root
root = after
}
root.next = pre
l.head = root
}
}

func (l *linkList) getMidNode() *node {
slow := l.head
fast := l.head
for fast != nil {
// å·²æŒ‡å‘æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ å¥‡æ•°
if fast.next == nil || fast.next.next == nil {
return slow
}
slow = slow.next
fast = fast.next.next
}
return nil
}

// å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆåˆ¤æ–­å›æ–‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸² å¥‡æ•°çš„è¯å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆåˆšå¥½æŒ‡å‘æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ å¶æ•°çš„è¯å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘ç©º
// æ ¹æ®æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ¥å®šä½ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
func isPalindrome(l *linkList) bool {
mid := l.getMidNode()
length := l.getLength()
backLinkList := creatLinkList()

if length%2 != 0 {
mid = mid.next
}
backLinkList.setHeadNode(mid)
backLinkList.reverseList()

preHead := l.head
p := backLinkList.head
for p != nil {
if preHead.data != p.data {
return false
}
preHead = preHead.next
p = p.next
}
return true
}

public class JosephProblem<T> {
private Node first;
private Node last;

public void add(T data) {
if (last == null) {
first = new Node(data);
last = first;
} else {
Node node = new Node(data);
last.next = node;
last = node;
}
last.next = first;
}

private class Node {
private Node next;
private T data;

public Node(T data) {
this.data = data;
}
}

/**
* @param x çº¦ç‘Ÿå¤«é—®é¢˜ä¸­ä»1å¼€å§‹ï¼Œåˆ°ç¬¬xä¸ªè¢«å»é™¤
*/
public void solveProblem(int x) {
Node t = first;
//å¾ªç¯ç»ˆæ­¢æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œåªå‰©ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
while (t.next != t) {
//æ‰¾åˆ°è¦å»é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹t
for (int i = 1; i <x-1; i++) {
t=t.next;
}
System.out.println(t.next.data);
//è®°å½•è¢«å»é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹
Node temp=t.next;
//å»é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹
t.next=temp.next;
//tæŒ‡å‘è¢«å»é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
t=temp.next;
}
}

JosephProblem<Integer> josephProblem=new JosephProblem<Integer>(){
{
add(1);
add(2);
add(3);
add(4);
add(5);
}
};
josephProblem.solveProblem(2);
}
}

public class LRUBaseArrayList {
// æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦
String array[] = new String[10];
public void add (String str) {
// åˆ¤æ–­æ–°è®¿é—®çš„å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­
Integer in = isInArray(str);
if (in == null) {// ä¸åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­
// è·å–éœ€è¦é‡æ–°æ’åºçš„å…ƒç´ ä½ç½®
int i = getPox();
putStrToFirst(str,i);
} else {// åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­
// inä½ç½®ä¹‹å‰çš„å…ƒç´ é‡æ–°æ’åºï¼Œæ–°å…ƒç´ æ”¾åœ¨æ•°ç»„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®
putStrToFirst(str,in);
}
}
private int getPox() {
int i = 0;
while (array[i] != null) {
if (i == array.length-1) {
break;
}
i++;
}
return i;
}

private void putStrToFirst(String str,int count) {
for (; count > 0; count--) {
array[count] = array[count-1];
}
array[0] = str;
}

private Integer isInArray(String str) {
for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
if (str.equals(array[i])) {
return i;
}
}
return null;
}

public void printAll() {
for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
System.out.print(array[i]+",");
}
System.out.println();
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
LRUBaseArrayListBy list = new LRUBaseArrayListBy();
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
while (true) {
list.add(sc.next());
list.printAll();
}
}
}

comments.comment_content:
public static boolean isPalindrome(Node root) {
if (root == null) {
return false;
}

Node head = root;
Node reserve = null;

while (head != null) {
Node next = head.next;
head.next = reserve;
reserve = head;
head = next;
}

while (root != null && reserve != null) {
if (root.c == reserve.c) {
root = root.next;
reserve = reserve.next;
} else {
return false;
}
}
return true;
}

def isPalindrome(node, isEven):
if (node == None):
return True
elif (node.next == None):
return True
else:
fast = node
slow = node
while ((fast != None) & (fast.next != None) & (fast.next.next != None) & (isEven == True)):
fast = fast.next.next
slow = slow.next
while ((fast != None) & (fast.next != None) & (isEven == False)):
fast = fast.next.next
slow = slow.next
if (fast != None):
slow = slow.next
print("slow.data:",slow.data)
high = slow.next
slow.next = None
temp = None
while (high != None):
temp = high.next
high.next = slow
slow = high
high = temp
temp = node
high = slow
flag = True
while ((temp != None) & (high != None)):
if (temp.data != high.data):
flag = False
break
temp = temp.next
high = high.next
return flag

```Python
def balancestr(string: str) -> bool:
if string is None or len(string) < 2:
return False
if len(string) == 2 and string[0] != string[1]:
return False
head = 0
tail = len(string) - 1
while head != tail and head < len(string):
if string[head] != string[tail]:
return False
head += 1
tail -= 1
return True
```

public static boolean isPalindrome(Node node) {
Node s = node;
Node f = node;
Node pre = null, next= null;

while (!(f == null || f.next == null)) {
// å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆå¾€å‰è¿­ä»£
f = f.next.next;
// æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆå¯¹å‰é¢èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œåè½¬
next = s.next;
s.next = pre;
pre = s;
s = next;
}
// å½“èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¥‡æ•°ä¸ªï¼Œéœ€è¦æ’é™¤ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
if (f != null) {
s = s.next;
}

while (s != null) {
if (!s.val.equals(pre.val)) {
return false;
}
s = s.next;
pre = pre.next;
}
return true;
}

class LRUCache {
int capacity;
int size;
LruNode head;
LruNode tail;
Map<Integer ,LruNode> map;

public LRUCache(int capacity) {
this.capacity=capacity;
this.size=0;
map=new HashMap<>(capacity);
head=new LruNode();
tail=new LruNode();
head.next=tail;
tail.pre=head;
}

public int get(int key) {
LruNode node= map.get(key);
if(node==null){
return -1;
}
moveToHead(node);
return node.value;
}

public void put(int key, int value) {
LruNode node= map.get(key);
if(node==null){
node=new LruNode(key,value);
addToHead(node);
map.put(key,node);
++size;
if(size>capacity){
LruNode tail= removeTail();
map.remove(tail.key);
--size;
}
}else{
node.value=value;
moveToHead(node);
}
}

private void moveToHead(LruNode node){
remove(node);
addToHead(node);
}

private void remove(LruNode node){
node.next.pre=node.pre;
node.pre.next=node.next;

}

private void addToHead(LruNode node){
node.next=head.next;
node.next.pre=node;
head.next=node;
node.pre=head;
}

private LruNode removeTail(){
LruNode pre=tail.pre;
remove(pre);
return pre;
}

class LruNode{
int key;
int value;
LruNode pre;
LruNode next;

public LruNode(){

}

public LruNode(int key,int value){
this.key=key;
this.value=value;
}
}

}

function lru(leng: number) {
let arr: Array<any> = [];
return function (node) {
let index = arr.findIndex((item) => item === node);
//1.ç¬¬ä¸€ç§æƒ…å†µä¹‹å‰å·²ç»å­˜åœ¨
if (index >= 0) {
arr.splice(index, 1);
arr.unshift(node);
return arr;
}
if (index === -1 && arr.length === leng) {
arr.pop();
arr.unshift(node);
} else {
arr.unshift(node);
}
return arr;
};
}

type Node struct {
Data int
Next *Node
}
func (s *Node) Num() int {
return Num(s)
}
func Num(s *Node) int {
if s != nil {
if s.Next == nil {
return 1
} else {
return Num(s.Next) + 1
}
} else {
return 0
}
}
func GetBackNode(head *Node,n int)*Node{
nodeCounts:=head.Num()
for i:=1;i<nodeCounts-n+1;i++{
head=head.Next
}
return head
}
func GetFrontNode(head *Node,n int)*Node{
nodeCounts:=head.Num()
if n>nodeCounts{
return head
}
for i:=1;i<n;i++{
head=head.Next
}
return head
}
func LRU(head,new *Node,mem int)*Node{
nodeCounts:=head.Num()
tmp:=head
n:=0
for i:=1;i<=nodeCounts;i++{
if head.Data==new.Data{
n=i
break
}else {
head=head.Next
}
}
fmt.Printf("n is %v\n",n)
if n==0{
if nodeCounts<mem{
new.Next=tmp
return new
}else{
secondLast:=GetBackNode(tmp,2)
secondLast.Next=nil
new.Next=tmp
return new
}
}else{
pre:=GetFrontNode(tmp,n-1)
pre.Next=pre.Next.Next
new.Next=tmp
return new
}
}

def is_palindrome(head) -> bool:
if not head:
return False

if head.next == None:
return True

slow = reverse_node(find_middle_node(head))
traverse(slow)
traverse(head)
while slow:
if head.data != slow.data:
return False
slow = slow.next
head = head.next
return True

def find_middle_node(head):
fast, slow = head, head
while fast.next and fast.next.next:
fast = fast.next.next
slow = slow.next
return slow


def reverse_node(head):
p, rev = head, None

while p:
rev, rev.next, p = p, rev, p.next

return rev

cur = node
while cur != None:
print(cur.data, end='-***-')
cur = cur.next
print()

```golang
package linked_list

import "fmt"

// Node å•å‘é“¾è¡¨èŠ‚ç‚¹
type Node struct {
Data any
next *Node
}

// GetNext è·å–ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
func (n *Node) GetNext() *Node {
return n.next
}

// SetNext è®¾ç½®ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
func (n *Node) SetNext(nextNode *Node) {
n.next = nextNode
}

// SinglyLinkedList å•å‘é“¾è¡¨
type SinglyLinkedList struct {
firstNode *Node
}

// Append å•å‘é“¾è¡¨æœ«å°¾å¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
func (l *SinglyLinkedList) Append(n *Node) {
if l.firstNode == nil {
l.firstNode = n
return
}
nodeNow := l.firstNode
for {
next := nodeNow.GetNext()
if next != nil {
nodeNow = next
continue
}
nodeNow.SetNext(n)
break
}
}

// GetNthNode è·å–å•å‘é“¾è¡¨çš„ç¬¬Nä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹(èŠ‚ç‚¹è®¡æ•°ä»0å¼€å§‹åˆ°len-1)
func (l *SinglyLinkedList) GetNthNode(n int) (*Node, error) {
node := l.firstNode
for i := 0; i < n; i++ {
node = node.GetNext()
if node == nil {
return nil, fmt.Errorf("ç¬¬%vä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºé“¾è¡¨çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè¯·æ±‚èŠ‚ç‚¹%vï¼Œè¶…å‡ºé“¾è¡¨èŒƒå›´", i, n)
}
}
return node, nil
}

// Len è·å–é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦
func (l *SinglyLinkedList) Len() int {
node := l.firstNode
for i := 1; true; i++ {
node = node.GetNext()
if node == nil {
return i
}
}
return -1
}

// InitSinglyLinkedList å°†ä¸€ä¸ªarrayåˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå•å‘é“¾è¡¨
func InitSinglyLinkedList[T any](data []T) *SinglyLinkedList {
l := SinglyLinkedList{}
for _, v := range data {
node := Node{
Data: v,
}
l.Append(&node)
}
return &l
}
```

2. æµ‹è¯•å›æ–‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ£€æµ‹

```golang
func CheckPalindrome(s []string) (bool, error) {
l := InitSinglyLinkedList[string](s)
n := l.Len()
for i := 0; i <= n-1-i; i++ {
char1, err := l.GetNthNode(i)
if err != nil {
return false, err
}
char2, err := l.GetNthNode(n - 1 - i)
if err != nil {
return false, err
}
if char1.Data != char2.Data {
return false, nil
}
}
return true, nil
}
```

type LISTNODE = ListNode | null

class ListNode {
data: string
next: LISTNODE
constructor(data: string) {
this.data = data
this.next = null
}
}

class LinkedList {
_head: LISTNODE
constructor(head: LISTNODE) {
this._head = head
}

size() {
let count = 0
let node = this._head
while (node) {
count++
if (this._head) {
node = this._head.next
}
}
return count
}

clear() {
this._head = null
}

getList() {
let lastNode = this._head
if (lastNode) {
while (lastNode.next) {
lastNode = lastNode.next
}
}
return lastNode
}

getFirst() {
return this._head
}
}

let node1 = new ListNode('n')
let node2 = new ListNode('s')
let node3 = new ListNode('x')
let node4 = new ListNode('n')

node1.next = node2
node2.next = node3
node3.next = node4

let list = new LinkedList(node1)

/**
* @param head:LISTNODE
* @return prev:LISTNODE
* åè½¬é“¾è¡¨
* */
const reverseList = (head: LISTNODE) => {
let prev: LISTNODE = null
let cur: LISTNODE = head
while (cur !== null) {
let next: LISTNODE = cur.next
cur.next = prev
prev = cur
cur = next
}
return prev
}

/**
* åˆ¤æ–­ç»™å®šçš„é“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå›æ–‡
* @return boolean
* */
const isRe = () => {
let listNode = list.getFirst()
let lastNode = reverseList(listNode)
let result = false
while (lastNode && listNode) {
if (listNode.data === lastNode.data) {
result = true
} else {
result = false
break
}
lastNode = lastNode.next
listNode = listNode.next
}
return result
}

public static boolean isHuiwen(LinkedNode str) {

LinkedNode node = str;
int len = 0;
while (node != null) {
node = node.next;
len++;
}

int[] array = new int[len];
int index = 0;
node = str;
while (node != null) {
array[index] = node.val;
node = node.next;
index++;
}

int start = 0, end = array.length - 1;
while (start < end) {
if (array[start] != array[end]) {
return false;
}

start++;
end--;
}

return true;

}

/**
* ä½¿ç”¨å•å‘é“¾è¡¨å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªLRUç¼“å­˜
*/
public class LRUDemo {

private static final int MAX_LENGTH = 5;

private static ListNode head;

public static ListNode add(ListNode newNode) {
if (isFull(head)) {
removeOld(head);
}
newNode.next = head;
head = newNode;
return head;
}
public static boolean isFull(ListNode node) {
int listSize = 0;
while (node != null) {
listSize++;
node = node.next;
}
return listSize == MAX_LENGTH;
}
private static void removeOld(ListNode node) {
while (node.next.next != null) {
node = node.next;
}
node.next = null;
}

public static ListNode get(ListNode node) {
ListNode cursor = head;
ListNode pre = cursor;
while (cursor != null) {
int val = cursor.val;
if (val == node.val) {
if (pre == cursor) {
break;
}
// æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ”¾åˆ°å¤´éƒ¨ï¼Œåˆ é™¤+æ–°å¢
pre.next = cursor.next;
add(cursor);
break;
}
pre = cursor;
cursor = cursor.next;
}
return head;
}
}

/**
* Definition for singly-linked list.
* public class ListNode {
* int val;
* ListNode next;
* ListNode(int x) { val = x; }
* }
*/
class Solution {
public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode head) {
if (null == head) {
return true;
}

ListNode half = this.findHalf(head);

// é“¾è¡¨åè½¬
ListNode secondStart = this.reverse(half.next);

// 2ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨å…ƒç´ ä¾æ¬¡æ¯”è¾ƒ
while (null != secondStart) {
if (head.val != secondStart.val) {
return false;
}

head = head.next;
secondStart = secondStart.next;
}
return true;
}

/**
* ç¡®å®šé“¾è¡¨ä¸­ä½
*/
private ListNode findHalf(ListNode head) {
// å®šä¹‰slowã€fastå¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆ
ListNode slow = head, fast = head;
while (null != fast.next && null != fast.next.next) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
}
return slow;
}

/**
* é“¾è¡¨åè½¬
* @param curNode
* @return
*/
public ListNode reverse(ListNode curNode) {
ListNode head = curNode;
ListNode pre = null;
ListNode nextNode;
while (null != head) {
nextNode = head.next;
head.next = pre;
pre = head;
head = nextNode;
}
return pre;
}
}

static ListNode reverse(ListNode head) { ListNode newNode = null;

newNode = cur;
cur = newNext;

return newNode; }

/**
* åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å›æ–‡
*
* å®šä¹‰æŒ‡é’ˆpæŒ‡å‘åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨çš„head, æŒ‡é’ˆqæŒ‡å‘åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨çš„tailã€‚
* åˆ¤æ–­å›æ–‡ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦å°†på‘åç§»,qå‘å‰ç§»å³å¯ï¼Œå¹¶åˆ¤æ–­på’Œqå¯¹åº”å­—ç¬¦æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ã€‚
*
* å½“é“¾è¡¨ç»“ç‚¹æ•°ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°æ—¶,whileå¾ªç¯çš„æ¡ä»¶æ—¶p != q;
* å½“é“¾è¡¨ç»“ç‚¹æ•°ä¸ºå¶æ•°æ—¶,do-whileå¾ªç¯çš„æ¡ä»¶ä¸º q->next != q;
*/
int isPalindrome(DouLinkedList* list) {
Node* p = list->head;
Node* q = list->tail;

int flag = 1; // 1æ˜¯å›æ–‡æ•° 0ä¸æ˜¯å›æ–‡æ•°

if(list->size % 2 ) {
// ç»“ç‚¹æ˜¯å¥‡æ•°
while(p != q) {
if(p->ch != q->ch) {
// ä¸æ˜¯å›æ–‡æ•°
flag = 0;
break;
}
p = p->next;
q = q->prev;
}
} else {
// ç»“ç‚¹æ˜¯å¶æ•°
do {
if(p->ch != q->ch) {
// ä¸æ˜¯å›æ–‡æ•°
flag = 0;
break;
}
p = p->next;
q = q->prev;
} while(q->next != p);
}

return flag;
}

func (this *MyLinkedList) Lru(v, len int) {
pre := this.head
cur := pre.next

for cur.next != nil {
next := cur.next
if cur.val == v {
break
}
pre = cur
cur = next

}
/*1ã€å¦‚æœæ•°æ®ä¹‹å‰å·²å­˜åœ¨äºé“¾è¡¨ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ é™¤åŸä½ç½®ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶åå†æ’å…¥åˆ°å¤´ç»“ç‚¹

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å¦‚æœé“¾è¡¨æœªæ»¡ï¼Œåˆ™å°†ç»“ç‚¹æ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨å¤´éƒ¨
ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰å¦‚æœé“¾è¡¨å·²æ»¡ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ é™¤å°¾ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œå°†æ–°ç»“ç‚¹æ’å…¥å¤´éƒ¨
*/
if cur.val == v {
pre.next = pre.next.next //åˆ é™¤åŸä½ç½®ç»“ç‚¹
this.length--
newNode := NewLinkNode(v)
newNode.next = this.head.next //æ’å…¥åˆ°å¤´ç»“ç‚¹
this.head.next = newNode
this.length++
} else {
if this.length == len { //é“¾è¡¨å·²æ»¡
pre.next = pre.next.next //åˆ é™¤å°¾ç»“ç‚¹
this.length--
newNode := NewLinkNode(v)
newNode.next = this.head.next //æ’å…¥åˆ°å¤´ç»“ç‚¹
this.head.next = newNode
this.length++
} else { //é“¾è¡¨æœªæ»¡
newNode := NewLinkNode(v)
newNode.next = this.head.next
this.head.next = newNode
this.length++
}
}

public boolean isPalindrome(){
Link tmp1 = first;
int n = count/2;
int i=0;

Link tmp2 = null;
while (i < n){
tmp1 = tmp1.getNext();
i++;
}
tmp2 = tmp1.getNext();

Link cur = tmp2.getNext();
Link tmp ;
while (cur !=null){
tmp = cur.getNext();
cur.setNext(tmp2);
//åå‘æŒ‡é’ˆ
tmp2 = cur;
cur = tmp;
}

i=0;
tmp1 = first;
boolean result = true;
while (i < n){
if(tmp2 == null) break;

if(!tmp1.getData().equals(tmp2.getData())) {
result = false;
}
tmp1 = tmp1.getNext();
tmp2 = tmp2.getNext();

i++;
}
return result;
}

//å¤§å®¶çœ‹çœ‹æ­£ç¡®ä¸å¦
public class LRUCache {

LinkedList<Integer> cacheList;
private static final int capacity = 10;

public LinkedList<Integer> getCacheList(){
if(cacheList == null){
cacheList = new LinkedList<>();
}
return cacheList;
}

//ä½œä¸ºç¼“å­˜ï¼Œå°±æ²¡å¤šå°‘å®¹é‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1),ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)
//å¦‚æœç¼“å­˜å¯ä»¥å­˜nä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œé‚£æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šo(n)ä¸»è¦åœ¨åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹å’Œæ’å…¥å°¾éƒ¨çš„æ“ä½œ,ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(n)
public int getCacheData(Integer data){
LinkedList<Integer> cacheList = getCacheList();
if(cacheList.contains(data)){
boolean remove = cacheList.remove(data);
if(remove){
cacheList.addFirst(data);
}
} else {
if(cacheList.size() == capacity){
cacheList.removeLast();
cacheList.addFirst(data);
} else {
cacheList.addFirst(data);
}
}
return data;
}
}

//åˆ é™¤åæ•´ç†ç¼“å­˜
function organizeDelCache(array) {

def delete_last_n_node(self, n):
"""åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨ä¸­å€’æ•°ç¬¬Nä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹.
ä¸»ä½“æ€è·¯ï¼š
è®¾ç½®å¿«ã€æ…¢ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆå…ˆè¡Œï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆä¸åŠ¨ï¼›å½“å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆè·¨äº†Næ­¥ä»¥åï¼Œå¿«ã€æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆåŒæ—¶å¾€é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œ
å½“å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆåˆ°è¾¾é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ‰€æŒ‡å‘çš„å°±æ˜¯é“¾è¡¨çš„å€’æ•°ç¬¬Nä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
å‚æ•°:
n:éœ€è¦åˆ é™¤çš„å€’æ•°ç¬¬Nä¸ªåºæ•°
"""
fast = self.__head
slow = self.__head
step = 0

while step <= n:
fast = fast.next_node
step += 1

while fast.next_node is not None:
tmp = slow
fast = fast.next_node
slow = slow.next_node

tmp.next_node = slow.next_node
#ã€æ¨ç®—åœ¨åªæœ‰å››ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ—¶å€™åˆ é™¤å€’æ•°ç¬¬1ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå®é™…åˆ é™¤çš„æ˜¯å€’æ•°ç¬¬3ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¾…æ£€éªŒ
# ç”±äºå¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤ï¼Œåº”è¯¥åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå‰ææ¡ä»¶:é“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦>nã€‘

#ã€å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰é¢„æƒ³ä¸­çš„ä»»ä½•ä¸€ç§ç»“æœï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æ€ä¹ˆè°ƒç”¨å‘¢ï¼Ÿä»€ä¹ˆæ ·çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ç”¨å‘¢ï¼Ÿã€‘

public static boolean isPlalindrome(Node node) {
// å…ˆæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
Node fast = node;
Node slow = node;

Node pre = null;
while (fast != null) {
Node fastNext = fast.getNext();
// å¥‡æ•°ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹,slow æ˜¯æ­£ä¸­é—´
if (fastNext == null) {
if (slow == node) {
return true;
}
slow = slow.getNext();
while (slow.getValue().equals(pre.getValue())) {
slow = slow.getNext();
pre = pre.getNext();
if (slow == null) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}
// å¶æ•°ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
else if (fastNext.getNext() == null) {
Node slowNext = slow.getNext();
slow.setNext(pre);
pre = slow;
slow = slowNext;
while (slow.getValue().equals(pre.getValue())) {
slow = slow.getNext();
pre = pre.getNext();
if (slow == null) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
} else {
Node slowNext = slow.getNext();
slow.setNext(pre);
pre = slow;
slow = slowNext;
fast = fastNext.getNext();
}

}
return false;
}

public class List06 {
public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode listNode) {
if (listNode == null) {
return false;
}
ListNode reverse = new ListNode(null, listNode.var);
ListNode point = listNode.next;
// ç¿»è½¬
while (point != null) {
reverse = new ListNode(reverse, point.var);
point = point.next;
}

// æ¯”è¾ƒç¿»è½¬åå’ŒåŸé“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒ
while (listNode != null) {
if (listNode.var != reverse.var) {
return false;
}
listNode = listNode.next;
reverse = reverse.next;
}
return true;
}
}


class ListNode {
ListNode next;

int var;

ListNode(ListNode next, int var) {
this.next = next;
this.var = var;
}
}

class Solution {
public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode head) {
if(head == null){
return true;
}
ListNode node = head;
ListNode fastNode = head;
ListNode last = null;
ListNode next = null;
while(fastNode.next !=null && fastNode.next.next != null){
fastNode = fastNode.next.next;
//åè½¬å‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†
next = node.next;
node.next = last;
last = node;
node = next;
}
//ç»“æŸå¾ªç¯åæƒ…å†µï¼š
//é•¿åº¦ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°ï¼šnode æŒ‡å‘ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œlast æŒ‡å‘ä¸­é—´å‰é¢çš„ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
//é•¿åº¦ä¸ºå¶æ•°ï¼šnode æŒ‡å‘ç¬¬ n/2 ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œlast æŒ‡å‘ç¬¬ n/2 - 1 ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹

ListNode pre,after;
if(fastNode.next != null){
//é•¿åº¦ä¸ºå¶æ•°ï¼Œä»nodeå¾€å‰ã€node+1å¾€åå¼€å§‹æ¯”è¾ƒ
after = node.next;
node.next = last;
pre = node;
}else{
//é•¿åº¦ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°ï¼Œä»node-1å¾€å‰ã€node+1å¾€åå¼€å§‹æ¯”è¾ƒ
pre = last;
after = node.next;
}
while(pre!=null && after!=null){ //å¯¹æ¯”ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰å³å¯
if(pre.val != after.val){
return false;
}
pre = pre.next;
after = after.next;
}
return true;
}
}

package main

// LRUç¼“å­˜æ·˜æ±°ç­–ç•¥çš„demo

// è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå•å‘é“¾è¡¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
type Node struct {
Next *Node
Value *interface{}
}


// ç¼“å­˜æ¨¡å‹
type Memory struct {
Head *Node // å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
Max int32 // é“¾è¡¨çš„æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦
}

// å‘å†…å­˜ä¸­æ’å…¥å˜é‡çš„æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œè‹¥é“¾è¡¨ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™æ’å…¥å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
func (m *Memory) Insert(newNode *interface{}) {
if m.Head == nil {
m.Head = &Node {
Next: nil,
Value: newNode,
}
}

var pre *Node // å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆ
current := m.Head // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æ‰€æœ‰ä½ç½®
var i int32 = 1 // è®¡æ•°ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹

n := &Node{
Next: m.Head,
Value: newNode,
}

for {
// è‹¥å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ™å°†å˜é‡æŒ‡é’ˆæ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨å¤´éƒ¨ï¼Œè‹¥é•¿åº¦è¶…å‡ºäº†é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ï¼Œåˆ™å°†é“¾è¡¨æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤
if current.Next == nil {
if i >= m.Max {
pre.Next = nil
m.Head = n
} else {
m.Head = n
}
break
}

// è‹¥è¯¥è®°å½•åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™å°†å…¶åœ¨é“¾è¡¨ç›¸åº”ä½ç½®åˆ é™¤ï¼Œå¹¶æ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨çš„å¤´éƒ¨ï¼Œè‹¥å·²åœ¨å¤´éƒ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸å˜
if current.Value == newNode {
if pre != nil {
pre.Next = current.Next
m.Head = n
}
}

i++
}
}

/**

* 1. å…ˆè¿›è¡Œæ¡ä»¶åˆ¤æ–­ï¼š èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡ä¸º0ï¼Œæˆ–è€…1 ï¼Œ ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ä¸ºtrueã€‚ (è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸åˆ¤æ–­ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬ä¸ºfalse æƒ…å†µè¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­)
* 2. å…ˆæ‰¾å‡ºä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚ è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°ã€å¶æ•°æ¥åˆ¤æ–­å“ªä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ä¸ºååŠéƒ¨åˆ†é“¾è¡¨èµ·ç‚¹ã€‚(æšä¸¾æ–¹å¼æ¨åˆ°å‡ºï¼Œè®°ä½è¿›è¡Œ)
* è‹¥ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°ï¼š fast == null ; ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºslow , åˆ™ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†èµ·ç‚¹ä¸º slow.next ;
* è‹¥ä¸ºå¶æ•°ï¼š fast != null; æœ‰2ä¸ªä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œ slow æ¬¡æ•°è½åœ¨ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚åˆšå¥½æ˜¯èµ·ç‚¹ã€‚ä¸ç”¨ç§»åŠ¨ã€‚
* 3ã€‚å¯¹ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œåè½¬ã€‚(é“¾è¡¨åè½¬éœ€è¦éå¸¸ç†Ÿæ‚‰ã€‚1min å†…å†™å®Œ)
* 4. å‰å2ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨è¿›è¡Œéå†ï¼Œ æ¯”è¾ƒæ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ã€‚

class Solution {
public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode head) {
if (head == null || head.next == null) {
return true;
}
// Step 1: æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
ListNode fast = head;
ListNode slow = head;

while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
}

// Step 1.2 ç¡®å®šåç»­èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
// è‹¥èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°ï¼Œ ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆšå¥½è½åœ¨ä¸­é—´ï¼Œ åˆ™åéƒ¨åˆ†é“¾è¡¨ï¼Œ æ˜¯ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„next;
// è‹¥èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡ä¸ºå¶æ•°ï¼Œ éå†ç»“æŸæ—¶ï¼Œ slow èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆšå¥½è½åœ¨åéƒ¨åˆ†èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å¤´ã€‚ åéƒ¨é“¾è¡¨å°±æ˜¯slow èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
if (fast != null) {
slow = slow.next;
}

// Step2: åè½¬åç»­çš„é“¾è¡¨

ListNode newHead = reserve(slow);

// Step3ï¼š ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨è¿›è¡Œç›´æ¥æ¯”è¾ƒã€‚
while (head != null && newHead != null) {
if (head.val != newHead.val) {
return false;
}
head = head.next;
newHead = newHead.next;
}
return true;

}

// é“¾è¡¨çš„åè½¬ï¼Œ ä¸€å®šéœ€è¦éå¸¸çš„ç†Ÿæ‚‰! ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå¾ˆå¿«å¯ä»¥æ‹¿æ¥ã€‚
private ListNode reserve(ListNode head) {
ListNode pre = null;
ListNode curr = head;
ListNode temp = null;
while (curr != null) {
temp = curr.next;
curr.next = pre;
pre = curr;
curr = temp;
}
return pre;
}
}

/**
* 1 å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆå®šä½ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå®šä½è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æ–°å»ºé“¾è¡¨é€†å‘å­˜å‚¨é“¾è¡¨
* 2 é“¾è¡¨èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œå¿½ç•¥æœ€ä¸­é—´ç»“ç‚¹
* 3 ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ä¸é€†åºæ–°é“¾è¡¨æ¯”å¯¹ï¼Œä¸€è‡´åˆ™ä¸ºå›æ–‡å¦åˆ™ä¸æ˜¯
* 4ã€æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(n),ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(n)

public boolean isPalindrome(Node head){
if(head == null){
return false;
}
if(head.next == null){
return true;
}
Node slow = head;
Node fast = head;
Node nowNode = new Node(slow.data,null);
//å¯»æ‰¾ä¸­é—´ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œå‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å€’å™é“¾è¡¨
while(fast != null && fast.next != null){
fast = fast.next.next;
nowNode = new Node(slow.data,nowNode);
slow = slow.next;
}

//å¦‚æœèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°ä¸ºåŸºæ•°ï¼Œæœ€ä¸­é—´ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹å¿½ç•¥ï¼Œè·³åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ã€‚æ–°åˆ—è¡¨ä¸éœ€è¦å¤„ç†ã€‚
if (fast != null) {

}

//æ¯”è¾ƒå‰©ä½™é“¾è¡¨å’Œæ–°é“¾è¡¨å†…å®¹æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ã€‚
while (slow != null) {
if (slow.data != nowNode.data) {
return false;
}
slow = slow.next;
nowNode = nowNode.next;
}
return true;
}

æ€è·¯ï¼šå®šä¹‰å¿«æ…¢ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œæ»¡æŒ‡é’ˆä¸€æ¬¡å‰è¿›ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆä¸€æ¬¡å‰è¿›ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå½“å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡æŒ‡å‘ç©ºçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘äº†é“¾è¡¨çš„ä¸­é—´ä½ç½®ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å°†å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆé‡æ–°æŒ‡å‘é“¾è¡¨å¤´ï¼Œå¹¶ä»¥æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆä½œä¸ºæ–°è¡¨å¤´åè½¬å‰©ä¸‹çš„é“¾è¡¨ï¼Œå†åŒæ—¶éå†å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆï¼ˆæ¯æ¬¡å‰è¿›ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒæ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å›æ–‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
public class Main {
private class ListNode {
char val;
ListNode next;
ListNode(char x) {
val = x;
}
ListNode(char[] arr) {
if (arr == null || arr.length < 1) {
throw new IllegalArgumentException("Illegal arr. ");
}
this.val = arr[0];
ListNode cur = this;
for (int i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
cur.next = new ListNode(arr[i]);
cur = cur.next;
}
}
public boolean isCycString(String str) {
if (str.isEmpty()) {
return true;
}
ListNode head = new ListNode(str.toCharArray());
//å®šä¹‰å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆ
ListNode slow = head;
ListNode fast = head;
//å¶æ•°
if (str.length() % 2 == 0) {
while (fast.next.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
}
ListNode reverse = reverse(slow.next);
fast = head;
while (reverse != null) {
if (reverse.val != fast.val) {
return false;
}
reverse = reverse.next;
fast = fast.next;
}
return true;
} else {
//å¥‡æ•°
while (fast.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
}
ListNode reverse = reverse(slow);
fast = head;
while (fast != null) {
if (reverse.val != fast.val) {
return false;
}
fast = fast.next;
reverse = reverse.next;
}
return true;
}
}
//åè½¬é“¾è¡¨
private ListNode reverse(ListNode head) {
ListNode newhead = null;
while (head != null) {
ListNode next = head.next;
head.next = newhead;
newhead = head;
head = next;}
return newhead;
}
}

LRUBasedArray.javaä¸­çš„removeAndCacheç›®å‰çš„é€»è¾‘åº”è¯¥å›ºå®šåˆ é™¤æ•°ç»„æœ€æœ«å°¾çš„å…ƒç´ ç„¶åæ’å…¥åˆ°æ•°ç»„æœ€å‰é¢ï¼Œä½†æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦çš„åº”è¯¥æ˜¯åˆ é™¤objectæ‰€åœ¨ä¸‹æ ‡çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç„¶åæ’å…¥åˆ°æ•°ç»„æœ€å‰é¢
public void removeAndCache(T object) {
T key = value[--count];
holder.remove(key);
cache(object, count);
}

å¦‚æœéå†åå‘ç°å·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™å°†è¯¥å…ƒç´ ä¹‹å‰çš„å…ƒç´ éƒ½å‘åç§»ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œå°†è¯¥å…ƒç´ æ’å…¥åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®ï¼›

// å›æ–‡åˆ¤æ–­ goå®ç°,æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(n),ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(1)
// https://github.com/andavid/leetcode-java/tree/master/note/234 å‚è€ƒæ–‡ç« 

func isPalindrome(list *linkedList) bool {
r := true
//æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆç§»åŠ¨å¹¶åè½¬ç›®å‰çš„å¯¹è±¡
//å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆæ²¡æœ‰ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼ˆå¶æ•°ï¼‰æˆ–è€…ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ï¼ˆå¥‡æ•°ï¼‰æ—¶åœæ­¢
var fast, slow, slownew *linkedList
slow = list
fast = list
slownew = list.next
for fast.next != nil && fast.next.next != nil { //O(n/2)
fast = fast.next.next
slownew = slow.next //å¾…å¤„ç†é“¾è¡¨bå,è¦ç§»åŠ¨ç»“ç‚¹
slow.next = slownew.next //æ–­å¼€bcè¿ac,è¦ç§»åŠ¨ç»“ç‚¹åçš„å¾…å¤„ç†ç»“ç‚¹ç”±slowä¿æŒï¼Œå¾…ä¸‹ä¸ªå¾ªç¯è·å–
slownew.next = list //æ–­å¼€ç»“ç‚¹æ”¾åˆ°é¦–ä½ï¼Œå¯¹æ–­å¼€çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹slownewæ¥è¯´åŸæ¥listå·²ç»æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°slownewç»“ç‚¹
list = slownew //æœ€æ–°å€¼å›å¡«å›å»ï¼Œå¦åˆ™listä¼šé€æ¸å°‘å€¼
}
//åŸæ¥æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ ¹æ®å¥‡å¶åˆ¤æ–­ä¸­é—´ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œæ–°çš„æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘å¤´ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆå…±åŒå¾€åç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œå¯¹æ¯”æ¯ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹å€¼éƒ½ä¸€æ ·ç¡®è®¤æ—¶ä¸ºå›æ–‡
//O(n/2)
if fast.next == nil { //å¥‡æ•°ï¼Œå·²ç»åˆ°é“¾å°¾
//å·²ç»æŠŠä¸­å¿ƒç»“ç‚¹ç§»åˆ°é“¾é¦–ï¼Œslow.nextç»“ç‚¹ä¸ºå›æ–‡ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ç»“ç‚¹
for n0, n1 := slow.next, slownew.next; n0 != nil; n0, n1 = n0.next, n1.next {
if n0.data != n1.data {
r = false
break
}
}
} else { //å¶æ•°
for n0, n1 := slow.next, slownew ; n0 != nil; n0, n1 = n0.next, n1.next {
if n0.data != n1.data {
r = false
break
}
}
}
return r
}

type linkedList struct {
data interface{}
next *linkedList
}

func (l *linkedList) append(d []interface{}) {
tl := l
for _, t := range d {
tl.data = t
v := &linkedList{}
tl.next = v
tl = v
}
for t := l.next; t != nil; { //remove last
te := t.next
if tl == te {
t.next = nil
break
}
t = te
}
}

func main() {
i := []interface{}{"a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "e", "d", "c", "b", "a"}
list := createASingleLinkedList(i)
fmt.Println("æ˜¯å¦å›æ–‡", isPalindrome(&list)) //true
i = []interface{}{"a", "b", "c"}
list = createASingleLinkedList(i)
fmt.Println("æ˜¯å¦å›æ–‡", isPalindrome(&list)) //false
i = []interface{}{"a", "b", "a"} //true
i = []interface{}{"a", "b", "c", "a", "b"}//false
i = []interface{}{"a", "a"} //true

}

func createASingleLinkedList(i []interface{}) linkedList {
list := linkedList{}
list.append(i)
return list
}

public class Node {
private Node next;
private String value;
public Node(String value) {
this.value = value;
}
public static void main(String[] args){
Node node1 = new Node("1");
Node head = node1;
node1.next = new Node("2");
node1.next.next = new Node("8");
node1.next.next.next = new Node("10");
node1.next.next.next.next = new Node("82");
node1.next.next.next.next.next = new Node("2");
node1.next.next.next.next.next.next = new Node("1");
System.out.println(isHuiWen(head));
}
public static Node reverse(Node head){
if (null==head||null==head.next)
return head;
Node pre = null;
Node cur = head;
Node tmp = null;
while (null!=cur){
tmp = cur.next;
cur.next = pre;
pre = cur;
cur = tmp;
}
return pre;
}
public static boolean isHuiWen(Node node) {
Node head = node;
Node tail;
Node step1 = node;
Node step2 = node;
Node mid = null;
while(step2!=null){
if (step2.next==null||step2.next.next==null){
mid = step1;
break;
}else{
step1 = step1.next;
step2 = step2.next.next;
}
}
tail = reverse(mid);
if (head.value!=tail.value)
return false;
while (head!=mid&&tail!=mid){
if (head.value!=tail.value)
return false;
head = head.next;
tail = tail.next;
}
return true;
}
}

/**
LRU åŸºäºæ•°ç»„å®ç° ,å¾…éªŒè¯ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§æˆ‘ç›®å‰ç†è§£çš„å¤æ‚åº¦æˆ‘å¥½åƒå†™äº†ä¸ªç«‹æ–¹å¤æ‚åº¦çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œæƒ³æ±‚åŠ©è€å¸ˆå’ŒåŒå­¦æˆ‘çš„è®¡ç®—æ˜¯å¦æœ‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•æ”¹è¿›
*/
type cacheOfLRU struct {
t [5]int
index int //equal len(t)-1
}

func (lru *cacheOfLRU) Append(v ...int) [5]int { //O(n^2)*O(n) = O(n^3)
for _,val := range v { //O(n)
lru.addSingleV(val) //O(n^2)
}
return lru.t
}

func (lru *cacheOfLRU) addSingleV(v int) bool { //O(n)+O(n^2) = O(n^2)
flag := true
for i:=len(lru.t)-1; i>lru.index; i-- { //æ·»åŠ é‡å¤v //O(n)*O(n) = O(n^2)
if lru.t[i] == v {
lru.merge(v,i) //O(n)
flag = false
break
}
}
if flag {
if lru.index ==-1 { //æ»¡é˜Ÿ,ä¸”æ— é‡å¤
lru.merge(v,len(lru.t)-1) //O(n)
flag = false
}else{
lru.t[lru.index] = v
lru.index--
flag = false
}
}
return !flag
}

func (lru *cacheOfLRU) merge(v int, startIndex int) bool{ //O(n)
flag := true
for j,k := startIndex,startIndex-1 ; k>lru.index; j,k = j-1,k-1 {
lru.t[j] = lru.t[k]
}
lru.t[lru.index+1] = v
return flag
}

cache2 := lru.Append(3) //æ»¡ é‡å¤
fmt.Println(cache,cache1,cache2,lru)
}

type cycleLinkList struct {
nodeR node
num int
skip int
start int
}

func (list *cycleLinkList) Init(num int) *cycleLinkList {//æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(n)
r := node{data:1}
t1 := &r
for i := 2; i <= num; i++ {
t1 = list.addNode(t1,i)
}
t1.next = &r
list.nodeR = r
list.num = num
return list
}

func (list *cycleLinkList) addNode(t *node, i int) *node {
te := node{data:i}
t.next = &te
return &te
}

func (list *cycleLinkList) Start(start,skip int) (int,error) { //æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(n)
if list.num > 0 && &list.nodeR != nil{
t := &list.nodeR
for i:= 1; i<=list.num; i++ {
if t.data == start{
break
}else{
t = t.next
}
}
return killSkip(skip,t)
}
return -1,errors.New("ERROR USE")
}

func killSkip(skip int, t *node) (int, error) {//æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Ÿ
for true {
for i :=0; i<skip; i++ {
t = t.next
}
killed := t.next
fmt.Println("kill ",killed.data)
t.next = killed.next
if t.next.data == t.data {
break
}
}
return t.data,nil
}

/*
ç¼“å­˜æ·˜æ±°ç®—æ³•ï¼Œ
LRUï¼Œæœ€è¿‘æœ€å°‘ä½¿ç”¨çš„ç¼“å­˜æ·˜æ±°æ‰
æœ€ç»ˆä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œä»¥ç±»çš„æ–¹å¼ç¼–å†™ï¼Œç”¨æ•°ç»„è¿™ç§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„

é»˜è®¤æ•°ç»„çš„length æ˜¯ 10ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨newæ—¶ä¼ å…¥

getCacheï¼Œæ ¹æ®keyå€¼è¿”å›ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œå¦‚æ²¡æœ‰åˆ™è¿”å›null

sortCacheï¼Œæ ¹æ®positionæ¥æ’åºï¼Œå…¶ä¸­positionå€¼è¶Šå¤§ï¼Œè¯´æ˜è¯¥ç¼“å­˜æ˜¯æœ€æ–°ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œè¶Šå°ï¼Œè¯´æ˜è¯¥ç¼“å­˜æœ€è¿‘æœ€å°‘ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ·˜æ±°
*/
class CacheLRU {
CACHE_ARR = []

constructor(len = 10) {
this.len = len
}

getCache(key) {
if (!this.CACHE_ARR.length) {
return null
}
let r = null
this.CACHE_ARR.some((c, i) => {
if (c.key === key) {
c.position = this.CACHE_ARR[0].position + 1
r = c.data
return true
}
})
return r
}

setCache(key, data) {
if (this.getCache(key)) {
return 'have'
}
const i = this.CACHE_ARR.length
if (i < this.len - 1) {
this.CACHE_ARR[i] = {key: key, data: data, position: this.CACHE_ARR[0] ? this.CACHE_ARR[0].position + 1 : 0}
} else {
this.CACHE_ARR[this.len - 1] = {key: key, data: data, position: this.CACHE_ARR[0].position + 1}
}
this.sortCache()
return data
}

sortCache() {
this.CACHE_ARR.sort((a, b) => {
return b.position - a.position
})
}
}

class Solution {
public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode head) {
if(head==null||head.next==null)return true;
ListNode slow=head;
ListNode fast=head.next;
ListNode pre=null;
ListNode prePre=null;
while(fast!=null&&fast.next!=null){
pre=slow;
slow=slow.next;
fast=fast.next.next;
pre.next=prePre;
prePre=pre;
}
ListNode q=slow.next;
slow.next=pre;
ListNode p=(fast==null)?pre:slow;
while(q!=null){
if(p.val!=q.val){
return false;
}
p=p.next;
q=q.next;
}
return true;


}
}

// declare
String string = "01234543210";

char[] arr = string.toCharArray();
int size = arr.length;
Assert.assertTrue(size % 2 == 1);

int meanIndex = (int) Math.floor(size / 2);
for (int i = 0; i < meanIndex; i++) {
Assert.assertEquals(arr[i], arr[size - i - 1]);
}

// alternative loop, same O()
//for (int i = meanIndex - 1; i <= 0; i--) {
// Assert.assertEquals(arr[i], arr[size - i - 1]);
//}

class Solution {
private static final char[]charMap = new char[256];
static{
for(int i=0;i<10;i++){
charMap[i+'0'] = (char)(1+i); // numeric
}
for(int i=0;i<26;i++){
charMap[i+'a'] = charMap[i+'A'] = (char)(11+i); //alphabetic, ignore cases
}
}

public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {
char[]pChars = s.toCharArray();
int start = 0,end=pChars.length-1;
char cS,cE;
while(start<end){
cS = charMap[pChars[start]];
cE = charMap[pChars[end]];
if(cS!=0 && cE!=0){
if(cS!=cE)return false;
start++;
end--;
}else{
if(cS==0)start++;
if(cE==0)end--;
}
}
return true;
}
}

class Scratch {

public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println(palindrome("cabb1bbac"));
}

public static boolean palindrome(String str) {
char[] cArray = str.toCharArray();
Node node = new Node(cArray[0], null);
Node head = node;
for (int i = 1; i < cArray.length; i++) {
node.next = new Node(cArray[i], null);
node = node.next;
}
Node fast = head, slow = head, reverse = null;
while (true) {
//å•æ•°å¹¶ä¸”å·²ç»åˆ°è¾¾ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
if (fast.next == null) {
//æ…¢èŠ‚ç‚¹åƒå‰èµ°ä¸€æ­¥å¯¹é½åè½¬èŠ‚ç‚¹
slow = slow.next;
while (slow.next != null) {
if (slow.c != reverse.c) {
return false;
}
slow = slow.next;
reverse = reverse.next;
}
return true;
}
//åŒæ•°åˆ°è¾¾ç»ˆç‚¹æ…¢æŒ‡åˆ°ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
if (fast.next != null && fast.next.next == null) {
//æ…¢èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å¯¹æ¯”ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒ
if (slow.c != slow.next.c) {
return false;
}
//æ…¢èŠ‚ç‚¹åƒå‰èµ°ä¸€æ­¥å¯¹é½åè½¬èŠ‚ç‚¹
slow = slow.next.next;
while (slow.next != null) {
if (slow.c != reverse.c) {
return false;
}
slow = slow.next;
reverse = reverse.next;
}
return true;
}
Node temp = slow;
fast = fast.next.next;
slow = slow.next;
temp.next = reverse;
reverse = temp;
}


}
}

*/
char c;

*/

this.next = next;
}
}

import java.util.Arrays;

/**

class Scratch {

public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println(Arrays.toString(joseph(30, 9, 15)));
}

/**
* çº¦ç‘Ÿå¤«é—®é¢˜
*
* @param totle æ€»æ•°
* @param killNum æ­»äº¡é—´éš”
* @param survivor å¹¸å­˜è€…æ•°é‡
* @return ç«™ä½
*/
public static int[] joseph(int totle, int killNum, int survivor) {
int[] sArray = new int[survivor];
//åˆå§‹åŒ–æ•°æ®
Node head = new Node(1, null);
//ä¸´æ—¶å­˜å‚¨å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
Node temp = head;
for (int i = 1; i < totle; i++) {
head.next = new Node(i + 1, null);
head = head.next;
}
//å»ºç«‹ç¯å½¢é“¾è¡¨
head.next = temp;
//å¼€å§‹å‡»æ€
int currentKill = 0, killIndex = 1;
while ((totle - currentKill) != survivor) {
//æ‰¾åˆ°è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹
while (killIndex != killNum - 1) {
temp = temp.next;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Random;

class Scratch {

private static Entity[] cache = new Entity[10];
private static Map<Integer, Entity> disk = new HashMap<>();

static {
Random random = new Random();
for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {
disk.put(i, new Entity(i, random.nextDouble()));
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
int j = 0;
Random random = new Random();
do {
int i = random.nextInt(10);
getValueByCache(i);
j++;
} while (j < 100);
}

public static Entity getValueByDisk(int key) {
try {
Thread.sleep(1000);
} catch (InterruptedException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
return disk.get(key);
}

public static Entity getValueByCache(int key) {
Entity entity = null;
boolean hit = false;
for (int i = 0; i < cache.length; i++) {
Entity temp = cache[i];
if (temp == null) {
break;
}
if (temp.key == key) {
entity = temp;
for (int j = i; j > 0; j--) {
cache[j] = cache[j - 1];
}
cache[0] = temp;
hit = true;
break;
}
}
if (!hit) {
Entity entityByDisk = getValueByDisk(key);
for (int i = cache.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
cache[i] = cache[i - 1];
}
cache[0] = entityByDisk;
entity = entityByDisk;
}
return entity;
}
}

class Entity {

public int key;
public double value;

public Entity(int key, double value) {
this.key = key;
this.value = value;
}
}

type(

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¼“å­˜, ç»™é¦–èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸€ä¸ªé»˜è®¤å€¼
func OpenCache() *Cache {
cache := Cache{
head: nil,
size: 0,
}
return &cache
}

// å‘ç¼“å­˜ä¸­é“¾è¡¨æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
func (cache *Cache) InsertCacheNode(val int) {
newNode := &CacheLinkedNode{
cacheVal: val,
next: nil,
}
node := cache.SearchCacheNode(val)
// è‹¥è¯¥æ•°æ®èŠ‚ç‚¹å­˜åœ¨
if node != nil {
// åˆ é™¤è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå°†è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹æ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨å¤´éƒ¨
cache.DelCacheNode(node)
}else if cache.size >= MAX_CACHE_SIZE{
// è‹¥è¯¥æ•°æ®èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹ç¼“å­˜å¤§å°ï¼Œè¶…è¿‡ç¼“å­˜åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå°†æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹æ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨å¤´éƒ¨
cache.DelCacheTail()
}
newNode.next = cache.head
cache.head = newNode
cache.size = cache.size+CACHE_NODE_SIZE
}

// åœ¨ç¼“å­˜é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾æ•°æ®èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
func (cache *Cache) SearchCacheNode(val int) *CacheLinkedNode {
pNode := cache.head
for pNode != nil && pNode.cacheVal != val {
pNode = pNode.next
}
return pNode
}

func (cache *Cache) DelCacheNode(delNode *CacheLinkedNode) {
pNode := cache.head
for pNode.next != delNode {
pNode = pNode.next
}
nextNode := delNode.next
pNode.next = nextNode
}

// åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨æ•°æ®èŠ‚ç‚¹
func (cache *Cache) DelCacheTail() {
pNode := cache.head
nextNode := pNode.next
for nextNode.next != nil {
pNode = nextNode
nextNode = nextNode.next
}
pNode.next = nextNode.next
}

public static boolean isPalindromeStack(Node node){
if (node == null || node.getNext() == null) {
return true;
}
Stack<Node> stackNode = new Stack<>();
Node curNode = node;
//å°†èŠ‚ç‚¹å‹å…¥æ ˆ
while (curNode != null){
stackNode.push(curNode);
curNode = curNode.getNext();
}

// å¼¹å‡ºæ ˆè¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒ
while (node != null) {
//å¦‚æœå½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼ä¸ç­‰äºå‡ºæ ˆå…ƒç´ å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™è¯´æ˜éå¯¹ç§°ä¸æ˜¯å›æ–‡
if(!node.getValue().equals(stackNode.pop().getValue())){
return false;
}
node = node.getNext();
}
return true;
}

é“¾è¡¨åˆ†åˆ«æ­¥è¿›1å’Œæ­¥è¿›2ï¼Œå½“æ­¥è¿›2åˆ°è¾¾é“¾è¡¨ç»“å°¾å½“æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ­¥è¿›1åˆšå¥½åˆ°è¾¾é“¾è¡¨ä¸­é—´ï¼ˆå›æ–‡ä¸€å®šæ˜¯å¶æ•°å­—ç¬¦ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯¹äºé“¾è¡¨çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯O(n)ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¦éå†ç©æ•´ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨ï¼Œç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯O(n)ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦nï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ä¸€ä¸ªå­˜æ”¾ä¸€åŠé“¾è¡¨çš„n/2

// åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å›æ–‡
function fn(str) {
// è®²å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå•é“¾è¡¨
let dn = cur = linkData = Link(str.split(''), 0);
let half = null
// åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ‰§è¡Œåˆ°é“¾è¡¨æœ€å
while(cur.next !== null) {
// åˆ¤æ–­æ­¥è¿›2çš„å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦æ‰§è¡Œåˆ°æœ€åï¼Œæ­¥è¿›2åˆ°è¾¾æœ€åï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æ­¥è¿›1åˆ°è¾¾ä¸€åŠå¤„ï¼Œå¼€å§‹åˆ¤æ–­é“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦å›æ–‡
if (dn === null) {

if (cur.data !== half.data) {
return false
} else {
cur = cur.next
half = half.next
}
} else {
// å­˜æ”¾äº¤æ¢é¡ºåºçš„æ­¥è¿›1çš„æ•°æ®
half = {data: cur.data, next: half}
// æ­¥è¿›1å¯¹è±¡è¿›1
cur = cur.next
// æ­¥è¿›2å¯¹è±¡è¿›2
dn = dn.next ? dn.next.next: null;
}
}
return true
}
// ç”¨äºæ„å»ºå•é“¾è¡¨ç»“æ„
function Link(arr, i) {
return {data: arr[i], next: arr[i+1] ? Link(arr, i+1) : null}
}

class LRUManager {

open func add(aNode: Node) {

while(head != nil) {

exist == nil

}
}

<?php

/**
* Class Node é“¾è¡¨èŠ‚ç‚¹
*/
class Node
{
public $data;
public $next;


public function __construct($data, $next)
{
$this->data = $data;
$this->next = $next;
}
}

/**
* æ ¹æ®å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è·å–é“¾è¡¨
* @param $str
* @return Node|null
*/
function getLinkedList($str)
{
$strArr = str_split($str);
$head = null;
foreach ($strArr as $val){
$head = new Node($val, $head);
}
return $head;
}

/**
* åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå›æ–‡
* @param $head
* @return bool
*/
function isPalindrome($head)
{
if ($head == null || $head->next == null) {
return true;
}

$prev = null;
$slow = $head;
$fast = $head;

while ($fast != null && $fast->next != null) {
$fast = $fast->next->next;
$next = $slow->next;
$slow->next = $prev;
$prev = $slow;
$slow = $next;
}

if ($fast != null) {
$slow = $slow->next;
}

while ($slow != null) {
if ($slow->data != $prev->data) {
return false;
}
$slow = $slow->next;
$prev = $prev->next;
}

return true;
}

$linkedList = getLinkedList($str);
$res = isPalindrome($linkedList);

public class SinglyLinkedList<T> {

private SinglyLinkedNode<T> header;

private int size;

private static final int MAX = 5;

public SinglyLinkedNode<T> getHeader() {
return header;
}

public void setHeader(SinglyLinkedNode<T> header) {
this.header = header;
}

public int getSize() {
return size;
}

public void setSize(int size) {
this.size = size;
}

@Override
public String toString() {
if (header == null) {
return "empty list";
}
StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
SinglyLinkedNode<T> item = header;
for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
T data = item.getData();
sb.append("index[").append(i).append("] : ").append(data).append("\n");

item = item.getNext();
}
return sb.toString();
}

class SinglyLinkedNode<T> {

private T data;

private SinglyLinkedNode<T> next;

public T getData() {
return data;
}

public void setData(T data) {
this.data = data;
}

public SinglyLinkedNode<T> getNext() {
return next;
}

public void setNext(SinglyLinkedNode<T> next) {
this.next = next;
}

public SinglyLinkedNode(T data) {
this.data = data;
}
}

}

class Solution {
public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode head) {
if (head == null || head.next == null)
return true;
ListNode quick = head;
ListNode slow = head;
while (quick.next != null && quick.next.next != null) {
quick = quick.next.next;
slow = slow.next;
}
quick = reverse(slow.next);
slow = head;
while (quick != null) {
if (slow.val != quick.val)
return false;
slow = slow.next;
quick = quick.next;
}
return true;
}

private ListNode reverse(ListNode head) {
if (head == null)
return head;
ListNode pre = null;
ListNode curr = head;
ListNode next = null;
while (curr != null) {
next = curr.next;
curr.next = pre;
pre = curr;
curr = next;
}
return pre;
}
}

class Solution {
public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode head) {
if (head == null || head.next == null)return true;
ListNode midNode = getMin(head);
ListNode minNext = reverse(midNode.next); // è·å¾—ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†è½¬ç½®åçš„é“¾è¡¨
ListNode p1 = head, p2 = minNext;
while (p2 != null) {
if (p1.val != p2.val)return false; // è¿™é‡Œæ³¨æ„ä¸åº”è¯¥æ¯”è¾ƒç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒå€¼
p1 = p1.next;
p2 = p2.next;
}
midNode.next = reverse(minNext); // æ¢å¤é“¾è¡¨
return true;
}

private ListNode getMin(ListNode head) {
if (head == null)return null;
ListNode fast = head, slow = head;
while (fast.next != null && fast.next.next != null) {
fast = fast.next.next;
slow = slow.next;
}
return slow;
}

private ListNode reverse(ListNode head) {
ListNode cur = head, prev = null;
while (cur != null) {
ListNode temp = cur.next;
cur.next = prev;
prev = cur;
cur = temp;
}
return prev;
}
}

//åœ¨leetcodeä¸ŠACçš„ï¼ŒO(n)æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼ŒO(1)ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œå…³é”®ç‚¹å·²ç»æ³¨é‡Šäº†
func isPalindrome(head *ListNode) bool {
if head == nil || head.Next == nil {
return true
}

var cur, fast = head, head
var prev *ListNode
for fast != nil && fast.Next != nil {//å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ°é“¾è¡¨ä¸­é—´ï¼Œé¡ºä¾¿æŠŠå‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†é€†åº
cur.Next, prev, cur, fast = prev, cur, cur.Next, fast.Next.Next
}
if fast != nil {//å¥‡æ•°çš„æƒ…å†µ
cur = cur.Next
}

for prev != nil && cur != nil {//å°†é€†åºçš„å‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†å’ŒååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ä¸€ä¸€æ¯”å¯¹
if prev.Val != cur.Val {
return false
}

cur = cur.Next
prev = prev.Next
}
return true
}

```java
/**

public static <Item extends Comparable<? super Item>> boolean isPalindrome(Node<Item> head) {
if (head == null) // é“¾è¡¨ä¸ºç©º
throw new NullPointerException("head is null");

if (head.next == null) // åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
return true;

// 1. ä½¿ç”¨å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆå®šä½ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚
TwoTuple<Node<Item>, Node<Item>> tuple = getMiddleNode(head);
Node<Item> first = tuple.first; // ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹æˆ–ä¸Šä¸­ä½èŠ‚ç‚¹
Node<Item> second = tuple.second; // ä¸‹ä¸­ä½èŠ‚ç‚¹
// è‹¥é“¾è¡¨çš„å¤§å°æ˜¯å¶æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼›è¦æ±‚å®ƒä»¬å¿…é¡»ç›¸ç­‰ã€‚
if (second != null) {
if (first.item.compareTo(second.item) != 0)
return false;
}

// 2. åè½¬é“¾è¡¨çš„ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼ˆä¸åŒ…å«ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼‰ã€‚
Node<Item> probe = first;
if (second != null) {
probe = second;
}
probe.next = reverse(probe.next);

// 3. å¯¹é“¾è¡¨çš„å‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œä»¥åŠåè½¬åçš„é“¾è¡¨çš„ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†æ‰§è¡Œéå†æ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œè¦æ±‚å¿…é¡»ç›¸ç­‰ã€‚
boolean result = true;
Node<Item> p1 = head;
Node<Item> p2 = probe.next;
while (p2 != null) {
if (p1.item.compareTo(p2.item) != 0) {
result = false;
break;
}
p1 = p1.next;
p2 = p2.next;
}

// 4. å†æ¬¡åè½¬é“¾è¡¨çš„ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼ˆä¸åŒ…å«ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¢å¤åŸå§‹é“¾è¡¨ã€‚
probe.next = reverse(probe.next);

return result;
}
```

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
struct Human {
int live;
int ID;
struct Human *next;
};
void printJosephus( struct Human *n, int count )
{
int interval = 3;
while ( count > 0 )
{
if ( n->live == 1 )
{
interval = interval - 1;

if ( interval == 0 )
{
n->live = 0;
interval = 3;
printf( " %d ", n->ID );

count = count - 1;
}
}
n = n->next;
}
}

int main()
{
struct Human * head = NULL;
struct Human * sec = NULL;
struct Human * third = NULL;
struct Human * four = NULL;
struct Human * fiv = NULL;
head = (struct Human *) malloc( sizeof(struct Human) );
sec = (struct Human *) malloc( sizeof(struct Human) );
third = (struct Human *) malloc( sizeof(struct Human) );
four = (struct Human *) malloc( sizeof(struct Human) );
fiv = (struct Human *) malloc( sizeof(struct Human) );

head->ID = 1; head->live = 1; head->next = sec;
sec->ID = 2; sec->live = 1; sec->next = third;
third->ID = 3; third->live = 1; third->next = four;
four->ID = 4; four->live = 1; four->next = fiv;
fiv->ID = 5; fiv->live = 1; fiv->next = head;

printJosephus( head, 5 );
}

# Definition for singly-linked list.
class ListNode(object):
def __init__(self, x):
self.val = x
self.next = None

class Solution(object):
def isPalindrome(self, head):
"""
:type head: ListNode
:rtype: bool
"""
def reverseList(root):
pre = None
cur = root
while cur:
tmp = cur.next
cur.next = pre
pre = cur
cur = tmp
return pre

slow = fast = head
while fast and fast.next:
slow = slow.next
fast = fast.next.next

newHead = reverseList(slow)
p1 = head
p2 = newHead
while p1 and p2:
if p1.val != p2.val:
return False
p1 = p1.next
p2 = p2.next
return True

# æŸ¥æ‰¾é“¾è¡¨ä¸­å¿ƒ

pslow = pslow.next

stack.append(pslow.val)
# å›æ–‡å¯¹æ¯”

public static boolean isHuiwen(Node<String> A){
Node<String> fast = A;

while(fast.next!=null && fast.next.next!=null){
fast = fast.next.next;
slow = slow.next;
}
Node<String> head = slow.next;
//ç¿»è½¬Nodeè¿‡ç¨‹
Node<String> headNext = null;//ä¿å­˜å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
Node<String> pre = null;//ä¿å­˜å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
while(head!=null){
headNext = head.next;
head.next = pre;//å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¸‹ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘å‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
pre = head;//å°†å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¿å­˜èµ·æ¥
head = headNext;//å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹å‘åç§»åŠ¨
}
//å¯¹æ¯”è¿‡ç¨‹
Node<String> n1 = pre;
Node<String> n2 = A;
while(n1!= null){
if(!n1.data.equals(n2.data)){
return false;
}
n1 = n1.next;
n2 = n2.next;
}
return true;
}

class Solution {
private ListNode tmp;

public boolean isPalindrome(ListNode head) {
tmp = head;
return check(head);
}

public boolean check(ListNode node){
if(node == null){
return true;
}
boolean result = check(node.next);
boolean equals = (tmp.val == node.val);
tmp = tmp.next;
return result && equals;
}
}

String input = "qwertyuioppoiuytrewq";
LinkedList<String> l = new LinkedList<String>();

for (String b : input.split("")) {
l.add(b);
}
if (l.size() % 2 != 0) {
System.out.println("no");
}
int mid = l.size() >> 1;
boolean flag = true;
while (mid != 0) {
if (!l.get(mid - 1).equals(l.get(l.size() - (mid - 1) - 1))) {
flag = false;
break;
}
mid--;
}

if (flag) System.out.println("yes");
else System.out.println("no");

public class Node<T> {
Node next = null;
T data;

Node(T data) {
this.data = data;
}
}

/**
* ç”¨é“¾è¡¨æ ¡éªŒæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå›æ–‡
* @param node
* @return
*/
public static boolean isHuiWen(Node<String> node) {
Node<String> fast = node;
Node<String> slow = node;
while (fast.next != null && fast.next.next != null) {
fast = fast.next.next;
slow = slow.next;
}
slow = fanZhuanNode(slow);
while (slow.next != null) {
if (slow.data.equalsIgnoreCase(node.data)) {
slow = slow.next;
node = node.next;
} else {
return false;
}
}
return true;
}

/**
* åè½¬é“¾è¡¨æŒ‡é’ˆ
* @param slow
* @return
*/
public static Node fanZhuanNode(Node<String> slow) {
Node<String> pri = slow;
Node<String> now = slow.next;
while (now != null) {
Node<String> next = now.next;
now.next = pri;
pri = now;
now = next;
}
slow.next = null;
return pri;
}
å¼±å¼±é—®ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œjava ç‰ˆæœ¬ SinglyLinkedList é‡Œ é™æ€ç±»Nodeé‡Œå£°æ˜ç§æœ‰å¯¹è±¡æˆå‘˜mData å’Œ mNext æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¯­æ³•é”™è¯¯å”‰ï¼Ÿ

func isPalindrome(head *Node) bool {
var slowOld *Node = nil
slow, fast := head, head.next
if fast == nil {
return true
}

var isEven bool
// find middle
for true {
if fast.next == nil {
isEven = true
break
}
if fast.next.next == nil {
isEven = false
break
}

fast = fast.next.next

// next and reverse
tmp := slow
slow = slow.next
tmp.next = slowOld
slowOld = tmp
}

var slowNext *Node
if isEven {
slowNext = slow.next
} else {
slowNext = slow.next.next
}

ret := true
for true {
if slow.val != slowNext.val {
ret = false
}

if slowNext.next == nil {
break
}

slowNext = slowNext.next

// next and reverse
tmp := slowOld
slowOld = slowOld.next
tmp.next = slow
slow = tmp
}

return ret
}

type Link struct {
value string
next *Link //ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
}
/**
é“¾è¡¨é›†åˆ
*/
type LinkList struct {
node *Link
count int
}
/**
é“¾è¡¨ä¸­æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œæ–°æ’å…¥çš„å†é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨
*/
func (l *LinkList) Add(value string) {
n := Link{}
n.value = value
if l.node == nil {
l.node = &n
} else {
node := l.node
for {
if node.next == nil {
break
} else {
node = node.next
}
}
node.next = &n
}
l.count = l.count + 1
}
/**
é“¾è¡¨ä¸­æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œæ–°æ’å…¥çš„åœ¨é“¾è¡¨å¤´
*/
func (l *LinkList) Enqueue(value string) {
n := Link{}
n.value = value
if l.node == nil {
l.node = &n
} else {
node := l.node
n.next = node
l.node = &n
}
l.count = l.count + 1
}
/**
åˆ¤æ–­å­˜å‚¨çš„æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å›æ–‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
*/
func (l *LinkList) IsPadlindrome() bool {
boolean := false
current := l.node
if l.count == 0 {
return false
} else if l.count == 1 {
return true
} else if l.count == 2 {
return current.value == current.next.value
} else {
//æ‰¾åˆ°é“¾è¡¨â€œä¸­é—´ä½ç½®â€
p := 1
//â€œä¸­é—´ä½ç½®â€ä¹‹åçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
var rightLink *Link
//â€œä¸­é—´ä½ç½®â€ä¹‹å‰çš„å…ƒç´ è¦é€†åºæ”¾å…¥æ–°é“¾è¡¨ä¸­
var leftlink = LinkList{}
//å‚è€ƒç•™è¨€ä¸­çš„å¿«è¿›æ…¢è¿›æ³•
for {
leftlink.Enqueue(current.value)
current = current.next
rightLink = current
p = p + 2
if p == l.count {
//é•¿åº¦æ˜¯å¥‡æ•°ï¼Œä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸å‚ä¸æ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œç›´æ¥ä»ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å§‹
rightLink = rightLink.next
break
} else if p > l.count {
break
}
}
//æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„å€¼æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰
var l1 = leftlink.node
var l2 = rightLink
for {
if l1 == nil {
break
} else {
if l1.value == l2.value {
l1 = l1.next
l2 = l2.next
boolean = true
} else {
boolean = false
break
}
}
}
}
return boolean
}
func main() {
list := LinkList{}
list.Add("5")
list.Add("0")
list.Add("1")
list.Add("1")
list.Add("0")
list.Add("5")
fmt.Println(list)
fmt.Println(list.IsPadlindrome())
}

public static boolean isBackWord(String str) {
boolean flag = true;
String[] arrs = str.split("");
int len = arrs.length;
if (str.length() % 2 != 0) {
for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
if (!arrs[i].equals(arrs[len - 1 - i])) {
flag = false;
break;
}
}
} else {
flag = false;
}

return flag;
}

public class Plalindrome {
public static void main(String[] args) {
test("");
test("1");
test("123");
test("123432");
test("123321");
test("1234321");
}

static void test(String s) {
boolean isPlalindrome = isPlalindrome(getNodeHeadFromString(s));
System.out.println(s + " is plalindrome ? " + isPlalindrome);
System.out.println();
}

static boolean isPlalindrome(Node head) {
System.out.print("before convert is:");
print(head);

if(head == null || head.next == null) {
return true;
}

Node slow = head;
Node fast = head;
while(fast.next != null && fast.next.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
}

Node afterHead = slow.next;
//åè½¬ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†
afterHead = converse(afterHead);

boolean result = true;
for(
Node beforeCur = head, afterCur = afterHead;
beforeCur != null && afterCur != null;
beforeCur = beforeCur.next, afterCur = afterCur.next
) {
if(beforeCur.c != afterCur.c) {
result = false;
break;
}
}
//åè½¬çš„éƒ¨åˆ†æ¢å¤
slow.next = converse(afterHead);

System.out.print("after convert is:");
print(head);
return result;
}

static Node converse(Node head) {
if(head == null || head.next == null) {
return head;
}
Node prev = null;
Node cur = head;
Node next = head.next;

while(next != null) {
cur.next = prev;
prev = cur;
cur = next;
next = cur.next;
}
cur.next = prev;
return cur;
}

static void print(Node head) {
for(; head != null; head = head.next) {
System.out.print(head.c);
}
System.out.println();
}

static Node getNodeHeadFromString(String s) {
Node head = null;
if(null == s || "".equals(s)) {
return head;
}
head = new Node(s.charAt(0));
Node prev = head;
for(int i = 1; i < s.length(); i++) {
Node cur = new Node(s.charAt(i));
prev.next = cur;
prev = cur;
}
prev.next = null;
return head;
}

static class Node {
char c;
Node next;
Node(char c) {
this.c = c;
}
}
}

def determine(str):
str_01 = list(str)
str_02 = list(str)[::-1]
for i in range(0, len(str) / 2):
if str_01[i] != str_02[i]:
return False

# print str_02

```java
class Node {
char val;
Node next;
}
boolean fastAndSlowPointer(Node node) {
if (node == null) {
return false;
}
if (node.next == null) {
return true; // å®šä¹‰å•èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿”å›true
}
Node fast = node.next;
Node slow = node;
Node prev = null; // slowæŒ‡é’ˆçš„å‰é©±èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç”¨æ¥åè½¬æŒ‡é’ˆ
while (fast != null) {
Node next = slow.next;
slow.next = prev;
prev = slow;
slow = next;
fast = fast.next;
if (fast != null) {
fast = fast.next;
if (fast == null) {
// è¯´æ˜é“¾è¡¨æœ‰å¥‡æ•°ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹(å› ä¸ºæ­¤æ—¶fastèŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯ç¬¬2nä½ç½®çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå•æ˜¯ä¸ºnull)
// slowæŒ‡é’ˆè·³è¿‡æœ€ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚å¥‡æ•°é•¿åº¦å›æ–‡ä¸€å®šæ˜¯ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸¤è¾¹å¯¹ç§°
slow = slow.next;
}
}
}
while (prev != null) {
if (prev.val != slow.val) {
return false;
}
prev = prev.next;
slow = slow.next;
}
return slow == null;
}
```

public static boolean isPalindrome(Node head){
Node pre = null;
Node slow = head;
Node fast = head;
while(fast != null && fast.next != null){
fast = fast.next.next;
Node next = slow.next;
slow.next = pre; //æŠŠslowçš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡å‘pre,ä½¿å‰åŠæ®µèŠ‚ç‚¹ååº
pre = slow;
slow = next;
}

//å½“æ˜¯å¥‡æ•°ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ—¶ï¼Œslowè¦è·³è¿‡æœ€ä¸­é—´è¿‡ç´ 
if(fast != null){
slow = slow.next;
}

while(slow != null){
if(slow.data != pre.data){
return false;
}
slow = slow.next;
pre = pre.next;
}
return true;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
Node node1_1 = new Node("n");
Node node1_2 = new Node("o");
Node node1_3 = new Node("o");
Node node1_4 = new Node("n");
node1_1.next = node1_2;
node1_2.next = node1_3;
node1_3.next = node1_4;
node1_4.next = null;
System.out.println(isPalindrome(node1_1));

System.out.println(isPalindrome(node2_1));

class Node(object):
def __init__(self, value=None, next=None):
self.value, self.next = value, next
class LinkedList(object):
def __init__(self, maxsize=None):
self.maxsize = maxsize
self.root = Node()
self.tailnode = None
self.length = 0

def __len__(self):
return self.length

def append(self, value):
if self.maxsize is not None and len(self) >= self.maxsize:
raise Exception("LinkedList is Full")
node = Node(value)
tailnode = self.tailnode
# è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰appendè¿‡ï¼Œlength=0ï¼Œè¿½åŠ åˆ°rootå
if tailnode is None:
self.root.next = node
# å¦åˆ™è¿½åŠ åˆ°æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åè¾¹ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ›´æ–°æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯åˆšappendçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
else:
tailnode.next = node
self.tailnode = node
self.length += 1

# åˆ é™¤å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹
def pop(self):
if self.root.next is None:
raise Exception('pop from empty LinkedList')
prevnode = self.root
for curnode in self.iter_node():
if curnode is self.tailnode and curnode is not self.root:
value = curnode.value
# åˆ é™¤å½“å‰å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹
del curnode
prevnode.next = None
self.tailnode = prevnode
self.length -= 1
return value
else:
prevnode = curnode

def popleft(self):
if self.root.next is None:
raise Exception('pop from empty LinkedList')
headnode = self.root.next
self.root.next = headnode.next
self.length -= 1
value = headnode.value

# å¦‚æœåˆ é™¤çš„æ˜¯å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œéœ€è¦æŠŠå°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹ç½®ä¸ºNone
if self.tailnode is headnode:
self.tailnode = None
del headnode
return value

åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¼šé—®å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼š
def is_reversed_str(word):
if not isinstance(word, str):
return
str_linkedlist = LinkedList(maxsize=len(word))
# O(n)
for item in word:
str_linkedlist.append(item)

size = len(str_linkedlist)
flag = True
#O(n^2)
for _ in range(size // 2):
if str_linkedlist.pop() != str_linkedlist.popleft():
flag = False
break
return flag

class Link {
constructor(data, next){
this.data = data;
this.next = next;
}
}

class Stack {
constructor(){
this.datas = []
}
add(data){
this.datas.push(data);
}
get(){
return this.datas.pop();
}
}

const a = new Link('a', null);
let next = a.next = new Link('b', null);
next = next.next = new Link('c', null);
next = next.next = new Link('b', null);
next = next.next = new Link('a', null);

function isRev(link){
if(!link.data || !link.next) return false;
const cache = new Stack();
let _link = link
let i = 0;
while (_link) {
cache.add(_link.data);
_link = _link.next;
}
while (link) {
const data = cache.get()
if(link.data !== data){
return false;
}
link = link.next;
}
return true;
}

console.log(isRev(a));
